overview: 'Moina Moti' is a beautiful depiction of true love. Moina is loved by two people: Moti and Mona. Mona loves Moina in an unrequited way. Poverty makes their life complicated and the story continues. Finally, Mona sacrifices his life, showing his deep love for Moina and helps to reunite Moina Moti. â€”humayunbuetian (IMDb)
title: Moyna Moti
